row.process:
! requires UC4 script variable &UC4RB_CHECKME# :SWITCH &$PLATFORM# : CASE "WINDOWS" set /a errors=0 : INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_FILESYSTEM.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_WINDOWS_CONSOLE_FILE_EXISTS
if %EXIST% == 0 ( : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Directory" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "&UC4RB_CHECKME# does not exist" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.ERROR.PARAMETER set /a errors=2 > nul ) else ( if %ISDIR% == 0 ( : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Directory" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "&UC4RB_CHECKME# exists but is not a directory " : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.ERROR.PARAMETER set /a errors=4 > nul ) )
if %errors% GTR 0 ( set retcode=%errors% goto :retcode ) : CASE "UNIX" errors=0 : INCLUDE PCK.AUTOMIC_FILESYSTEM.PUB.INCLUDE.CHECK_UNIX_SHELL_FILE_EXISTS
if [ $EXIST -eq 0 ] then : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Directory" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "&UC4RB_CHECKME# does not exist" : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.ERROR.PARAMETER errors=2 else if [ $ISDIR -eq 0 ] then : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_PARAMETER# = "Directory" : SET &UC4RB_LOGGING_ERROR# = "&UC4RB_CHECKME# exists but is not a directory " : INC PCK.ITPA_SHARED.PRV.INCLUDE.LOGGING.ERROR.PARAMETER errors=4 fi fi
if [ $errors -gt 0 ] then exit $errors fi : OTHER :ENDSWITCH
